name: Confession Deep-Sixed
description:
A girl talking to her departed ones in the cemetery with a shovel.

A web-based novel without audio or main menu.

A short kinetic novel made for O2A2 (Only One of Any Asset), a visual novel jam.

May contain depictions of violence, death, and insanity.

Parental guidance is advised.

A solo project by clso.nd for the sake of trying a different engine.
